Detailed Description

Use the NodeTreeIterator class to traverse the model's node hierarchy (skeleton).

The class models a unidirectional iterator and allows linear traversal of the node tree, providing access to each node in the tree through the NodeTreeDataItem class (returned by the and -> operators). See pymodel.cpp for and example of how to use the iterator.

)

Constructs a NodeTreeIterator that will traverse the given node tree.

Parameters:
cur the current element in the node tree.
end on past the last element in the node tree.
root the world transformation matrix of the root node.
